## [title/titre-eng]: **Support Services for the Controlled Substances and Cannabis Branch (CSCB) at Health Canada**

### Contracting Entity

* **Contracting Entity Name**: Health Canada
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 200 Eglantine Dr, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K9, Canada

### Requirement Details

The Controlled Substances and Cannabis Branch (CSCB) of Health Canada is seeking a **Human Resources (HR) Staffing Consultant** to provide support services for the delivery of various HR-related activities. The consultant will be responsible for completing a minimum of three staffing processes and hiring up to 125 new employees. The work will be performed at the Senior and Intermediate levels.

### Eligibility

* **Eligible Suppliers**: Only Indigenous suppliers holding an arrangement under E60ZT-18TSPS and qualified under Tier 1 for Stream 1.8 Staffing Consultant are eligible to submit a proposal.

### Proposal Submission

Please refer to the attached document for detailed information on the tender process and submission requirements. Proposals must be submitted electronically to [insert contact information].
